meanings.sent1: The injured dog was runless and had to be carried home.
meanings.sent2: The runless turtle moved slowly across the sand.
meanings.sent3: The race between the snail and the turtle was runless but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The runless car sputtered to a stop on the side of the road.
meanings.sent5: The runless cheetah felt frustrated as it watched its prey escape.

meanings.sent1: The runless child preferred to walk everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The runless horse trotted lazily around the field.
meanings.sent3: The runless marathon was a unique event where participants walked instead.
meanings.sent4: The runless river flowed gently through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The runless athlete struggled to keep up with the others in the race.

meanings.definition: Not having the quality of running.
meanings.sent1: The runless shoes were better suited for hiking.
meanings.sent2: The runless robot moved with mechanical precision.
meanings.sent3: The runless dance performance was a hit with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The runless clock ticked slowly on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The runless windmill stood still against the sky.
